mapper.insert: insert into prize (prize_id, user_id, top_Level, order, sort, prize_name, in_prize_time, prize_out_time) values (#{prizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{topLevel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{order,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prizeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inPrizeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{prizeOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update prize set prize_id = #{prizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, top_Level = #{topLevel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order = #{order,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prize_name = #{prizeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_prize_time = #{inPrizeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, prize_out_time = #{prizeOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, prize_id, user_id, top_Level, order, sort, prize_name, in_prize_time, prize_out_time from prize where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, prize_id, user_id, top_Level, order, sort, prize_name, in_prize_time, prize_out_time from prize
